title: Remove "MyGallery" header text from top-left

requirements.text: Remove the visible "MyGallery" text from the top-left header area next to the app icon on the home page by updating the header component (currently rendered as an <h1> in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx).

quotes: Στην κεντρική σελίδα της σβησε το κείμενο "MyGallery " στο πανω αριστερό μέρος της σελίδας δίπλα από το εικονίδιο της εφαρμογής. Μην Αλλάξεις τίποτα άλλο στην εφαρμογή και στις λειτουργίες της .

acceptanceCriteria: When viewing the home page header, the app icon remains visible but the "MyGallery" text is not displayed anywhere in the top-left header area.
No other UI elements, layout spacing (beyond removing the text itself), animations, routes, or app functionality are changed.

constraints: Do not change anything else in the application besides removing the "MyGallery" header text.
Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Rebranding the app name elsewhere (e.g., manifest, page title, footer) unless required to remove the specific top-left header text.
Any changes to menu behavior, animations, authentication, uploads, gallery features, or backend logic.
